body: This has a game on steam
I've never had a such a conflicting feeling of feeling absolutely sorry for someone and also finding him absolutely creepy at the same time.

This wasn't only translated they also cut off the spaces between frames to reduce the height of the image which leads to errors. Like in the last image where the president tells him he is the number one suspect, you can see that the line of the dress that goes from her belly to her crotch is out of phase. I can tell cuz I've been reading it since day one.
Im glad the comments are back, now onto more important buisness, i meed this translated, like NOW!
I’ve checked out the raws, and I gotta say the mc turns into a BEAST. Nigga went full alpha and took control of the situation

There was ZERO sex or even gropping in this. . .     
yet the way the women are drawn is enough to make me leak. Fuck i wanna read the rest ASAP so please keep tranlating sensei
